title: IPL 2025: Sai Sudharsan Shines As GT Rout RR For 4th Consecutive Win
description: Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Highlights, IPL 2025: GT continued their winning streak in IPL 2025 with a 58-run win over RR in Ahmedabad.
excerpt: Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Highlights, IPL 2025: GT continued their winning streak in IPL 2025 with a 58-run win over RR in Ahmedabad.
text: GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2025© BCCI Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Highlights, IPL 2025: Gujarat Titans continued their winning streak in IPL 2025 with a 58-run win over Rajasthan Royals in Ahmedabad on Wednesday. Getting an invitation to bat first, GT posted 217 for 6 in 20 overs, thanks to Sai Sudharsan's 82 off 53 balls. Jos Buttler and Shahrukh Khan too scored crucial 36 each. Maheesh Theekshana and Tushar Deshpande picked two wickets apiece but both of them leaked over 50 runs in their respective spells. Jofra Archer, on the other hand, was really impressive with figures of 1 for 30 in four overs. In the chase, RR got off to a poor start but Sanju Samson's 41 off 28 kept them going. Shimron Hetmyer scored 52 off 32 towards the end but failed to get any support from the other end. This happened to be GT's fourth win on the trot while RR's two-match winning run ended with the defeat. A good game for him suddenly turned out in a poor one as the bowler's figures now read 1 for 29 in 3 overs. Hetmyer slammed a four while Samson hit a four and a six in the over. Rajasthan Royals need 138 runs in 65 balls.April09202522:23 (IST)GT vs RR Live: WICKET!Dhruv Jurel is OUT! It was a short ball from Rashid Khan and Jurel hit it in the air. In the replay, the deflection was clear on the ball after it came in contact of the bat and the Ultraedge too confirmed it. However, Parag too hit the ground at the same time. html:
GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2025© BCCI

Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Highlights, IPL 2025: Gujarat Titans continued their winning streak in IPL 2025 with a 58-run win over Rajasthan Royals in Ahmedabad on Wednesday. Getting an invitation to bat first, GT posted 217 for 6 in 20 overs, thanks to Sai Sudharsan's 82 off 53 balls. Jos Buttler and Shahrukh Khan too scored crucial 36 each. Maheesh Theekshana and Tushar Deshpande picked two wickets apiece but both of them leaked over 50 runs in their respective spells. Jofra Archer, on the other hand, was really impressive with figures of 1 for 30 in four overs. In the chase, RR got off to a poor start but Sanju Samson's 41 off 28 kept them going. Shimron Hetmyer scored 52 off 32 towards the end but failed to get any support from the other end. This happened to be GT's fourth win on the trot while RR's two-match winning run ended with the defeat. (Scorecard)

Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals, IPL 2025 Highlights -

Get alerts for live updates

Turn on notifications to receive alerts as stories develop in real-time. You can manage alerts in your app's settings.

  • April09202523:29 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Gujarat Titans win!

    Sai Kishore gets the wicket of Maheesh Theekshana and that is the game for Gujarat Titans. They have won this contest by 58 runs. This will hugely boost their net run rate. This is also the fourth consecutive victory for GT and they go top of the table with it.

  • April09202523:13 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: WICKET!

    Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore has dismissed Tushar Deshpande and Rajasthan Royals are nine down with it. Gujarat Titans need only one wicket to register their fourth consecutive win in IPL 2025. What a form they are having!

    RR 150/9 (16.5)

  • April09202523:07 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: OUT!

    Prasidh Krisna dismissed Jofra Archer on the third ball of the over. It was his second wicket in the game. Archer miscued the ball to the player at mid-off.

  • April09202523:06 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Fifty!

    A four from Shimron Hetmyer and with it, he races to his half-century in 29 balls. That has come really quick from the Rajasthan Royals' southpaw. Can he take this innings deep and win the game for his side? RR need 75 runs in 29 balls.

    RR 143/6 (15.1)

  • April09202523:00 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    Shimron Hetmyer finally manages to connect one from the middle of his bat. He went across and Sai Kishore bowled it fuller. The southpaw slammed down the ground for a biggie. Rajasthan Royals need 82 runs in 33 balls.

    RR 136/6 (14.3)

  • April09202522:58 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: RR need 91 in 36!

    The asking rate for Rajasthan Royals has gone above 15. RR need 91 runs in 36 balls. They will keep hoping by the time Shimron Hetmyer is there at the middle. R Sai Kishore has been brought into the attack. He will bowl the 15th over.

    RR 127/6 (14)

  • April09202522:48 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Brilliant bowling!

    What an over this was from Prasidh Krishna! Only four runs came in it and a wicket. Rajasthan Royals need 99 runs in 42 balls. The asking rate has gone over 14. RR's hopes rely on Shimron Hetmyer, who is batting on 32 off 21 balls.

    RR 119/5 (13)

  • April09202522:45 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: OUT!

    Sanju Samson is gone! A short ball outside off stump from Prasidh Krishna and Samson has hit it right into the hands of Sai Kishore at short third man. This is a big blow for Rajasthan Royals, who were going really well in this chase. RR need 102 runs in 46 balls.

    RR 116/5 (12.1)

  • April09202522:39 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Expensive over!

    Kulwant Khejroliya leaked 16 runs in the over. A good game for him suddenly turned out in a poor one as the bowler's figures now read 1 for 29 in 3 overs. Hetmyer slammed a four while Samson hit a four and a six in the over. Rajasthan Royals need 117 runs in 54 balls.

    RR 101/4 (11)

  • April09202522:30 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    It was tossed up from Rashid Khan and Shimron Hetmyer slammed it over the long-on for a six. There was a long-on in place but he had no part to play as the ball comfortably sailed over his head. Rajasthan Royals need 138 runs in 65 balls.

  • April09202522:23 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: WICKET!

    Dhruv Jurel is OUT! It was a short ball from Rashid Khan and Jurel hit it in the air. Sai Sudharsan ran in from the deep and took a really good catch by diving forward. This wicket will boost the confidence of Rashid, who has otherwise looked off-colour this season.

    RR 68/4 (7.4)

  • April09202522:19 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: OUT!

    Riyan Parag edged  Kulwant Khejroliya's delivery to GT wicketkeeper Jos Buttler. Umpire raised his finger over the appeal for a caught behind but Parag decided to review it. In the replay, the deflection was clear on the ball after it came in contact of the bat and the Ultraedge too confirmed it. However, Parag too hit the ground at the same time. He was aruguing with the ground umpires even after the third umpire signalled it out.

    RR 60/3 (6.4)

  • April09202522:12 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: End of powerplay!

    Prasidh Krishna was brought into the attack and he has leaked 12 runs in his first over. Riyan Parag welcomed him with a six and slammed a four on the final ball of the over. Rajasthan Royals have begun well in the chase despite losing two wickets. They need 161 runs in 84 balls.

    RR 57/2 (6)

  • April09202522:07 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Siraj leaks runs!

    Mohammed Siraj has leaked 11 runs in his third over. While Parag welcomed the pacer with a six in the over, Samson hit a four later in the fifth ball. Rajasthan Royals need 173 runs in 90 balls.

    RR 45/2 (5)

  • April09202522:01 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    Wow! That is a terrific shot from Riyan Parag for a six. Mohammed Siraj overpithced it and Parag slammed it over the long-on fence for an 81-metre six. Rajasthan Royals need 178 runs in 95 balls.

    RR 40/2 (4.1)

  • April09202522:00 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Samson in fine touch!

    Sanju Samson is looking in really good touch tonight! He slammed Arshad Khan for a four and a sensational six in the over before hitting the bowler for another four. A total of 16 runs came off the over. Rajasthan Royals need 184 runs.

  • April09202521:52 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: WICKET!

    Another RR batter bites the dust! Nitish Rana got a short ball from Mohammed Siraj outside off-stump and played an upper cut on it but found Khejroliya at third man. RR are two down inside three overs.

    RR 12/2 (2.2)

  • April09202521:47 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: OUT!

    Yashasvi Jaiswal is out for 6 off 7 balls. He could call himself unlucky here as it was struck really well but the southpaw found the fielder at deep backward point. 

    RR 10/1 (1.2)

  • April09202521:45 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Nine-run over!

    Mohammed Siraj conceded 9 runs in his first over. He was getting good swing in the over but was unlucky for the fact that he failed to produce any edge from the southpaw's bat.

    RR 9/0 (1)

  • April09202521:41 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: FOUR!

    A fuller from Mohammed Siraj outside off stump and Yashasvi Jaiswal has driven it away powerfully for a four. The ball went through the sweeper cover for the boundary.

    RR 5/0 (0.2)

  • April09202521:39 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: The chase begins!

    Kulwant Khejroliya has come in as impact sub for Sherfane Rutherford. Mohammed Siraj is ready with the new ball in hand. Yashasi Jaiswal is on the strike, Sanju Samson is at the other end. Here we go...

  • April09202521:24 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Gujarat Titans post 217 for 6!

    16 runs came off the final over of Sandeep Sharma and Gujarat Titans have got a good total on the board. Sandeep finishes his spell with figures of 1 for 41. It was a consistent batting effort from GT as they were always on course for a 200-plus total. They end up getting around 17 extra runs. Even if there is dew in second innings, RR need to start their chase well.

    GT 217/6 (20)

  • April09202521:19 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: OUT!

    Tushar Deshpande claimed the wicket of Rashid Khan on the final ball of his spell. He ends with figures of 2 for 53 in four overs. 14 runs came off the over. One more over is left in the innings and GT have already 200 on the board.

    GT 201/6 (19)

  • April09202521:14 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: WICKET!

    18.2 - Sai Sudharsan is finally gone! He falls for 82 off 53 balls. The southpaw was trying very hard to go for big shots and ends up losing his wicket after edging one delivery to wicketkeeper Sanju Samson. 

  • April09202521:11 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Catch dropped!

    Jofra Archer nearly had the wicket of Sai Sudharsan but Shubham Dubey dropped the catch at backward square leg. It seemed that he failed to spot the ball there, maybe because of the lights. 11 runs came off the over.

    GT 187/4 (18)

  • April09202521:06 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX! FOUR!

    Sai Sudharsan has put his foot on the accelerator pedal. He slammed Sandeep Sharma for a six and a four in the over. A total of 13 runs came in it. Three more overs of play left in this innings and GT could easily go past 200.

    GT 176/4 (17)

  • April09202521:01 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: WICKET!

    Smart bowling from Sandeep Sharma! He bowled it outside the tramline and Sherfane Rutherford lost his wicket while trying to chase the delivery. He ended up edging the ball to wicketkeeper Sanju Samson.

    GT 163/4 (16.1)

  • April09202520:58 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Smart from Theekshana!

    Maheesh Theekshana has got the wicket of Shahrukh Khan. The right-handed batter jumped out of his crease quite early and a smart Theekshana fired it fuller outside off stump around the tramline. Sanju Samson collected the ball and effected the stumping. Shahrukh fell for 36 off 20 balls. 

    GT 156/3 (15.4)

  • April09202520:53 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Brilliant bowling!

    Sandeep Sharma has conceded only five runs in his second over. He kept both the set GT batters - Sai Sudharsan and Shahrukh Khan in check. This is poor batting from GT. They have 8 wickets left in hand. They should fire more to get past 200 or even try to reach 220.

    GT 145/2 (15)

  • April09202520:45 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    That is an off-spinning delivery from Maheesh Theekshana and Shahrukh Khan has pulled it for a massive six. That is a big-big shot from the right-handed GT batter.

    GT 132/2 (13.3)

  • April09202520:40 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    Wow! That is a beautiful shot from Shahrukh Khan for a six over extra cover. Tushar Deshpande bowled it fuller and the right-handed batter slammed it over the ropes. A wide and a single follows. 14 runs came off the over. 

    GT 124/2 (13)

  • April09202520:31 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: 100 up for Gujarat Titans!

    Six runs came off Jofra Archer's third over. Gujarat Titans have 100 runs on the board with 9 more overs of play left in the innings. They need to rebuild and could easily get to a total of over 200 plus. Sai Sudharsan, who is batting on 53, will be the key for them. 

    GT 100/2 (11)

  • April09202520:24 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Eventful over!

    Shubman Gill raced to his fifty in the over but Gujarat Titans copped a huge blow as Jos Buttler was sent back to the hut on the bowling of Maheesh Theekshana. Just 6 runs came in the over and a wicket.

    GT 94/2 (10)

  • April09202520:20 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: Good bowling!

    Tushar Deshpande has bowled a really good over. Only 7 runs came in it. 

    GT 88/1 (9)

  • April09202520:10 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: FOUR!

    A good length ball from Maheesh Theekshana and Jos Buttler slammed it away through the extra cover. A couple came off the next ball before Buttler slammed another four down the ground. A total of 14 runs came off the over. It seems GT have put their foot on the accelerator pedal now. 

    GT 81/1 (8)

  • April09202520:05 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: FOUR!

    A paddle scoop from Jos Buttler for a four. Fazalhaq Farooqi bowled it fuller and Buttler went across his stumps to get the boundary. The left-arm pacer followed it up with a short ball on the body and Buttler pulled it through the backward square leg for a four. 11 runs came off the over.

    GT 63/1 (6.5)

  • April09202519:57 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: FOUR!

    It was bowled at good length on the off-side and Sai Sudharsan cut it away for a four. 18 runs came off the Tushar Deshpande over. Gujarat Titans are going really well despite losing the wicket of Gill early in the innings.

    GT 49/1 (5)

  • April09202519:54 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: SIX!

    That is a superb paddle scoop from Sai Sudharsan for a six. Tushar Deshpande bowled it at back of a length and Sudharsan scooped it through the fine leg for a biggie. The fine leg was inside the ring and this saw the southpaw playing this smart shot.

    GT 38/1 (4.2)

  • April09202519:52 (IST)

    GT vs RR Live: 10 off the over!

    Fazalhaq Farooqi has conceded a total of 17 runs in his two overs so far. He too is getting the swing but certainly not getting his pitch right.

    GT 31/1 (4)
